segments.text: Give me a pack of first-class stamps , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . That will be five dollars . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I want some post cards and some airmail stamps . I want to send some letters to South America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a moment , I'll look up the rate for air-mail letters to South America .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me how much it will cost to send a package to Colombia ? Also , I what to know how long it will take .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have the package with you ? I would have to weigh it to see how much it would cost .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . All you have to do declare the value of the package and decide how much you want to insure it for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a way that I can be sure that the people in South america receive my package ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The post office rarely loses package . You can , however , request a rectum receipt .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One last question-what are your hours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We open at eight-thirty in the morning and close at five-thirty in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , you helped me a lot .
segments.speaker: S1
